thread.title: Cohen Bramall: First day at Arsenal felt like a dream (Video)
thread.title_full: Cohen Bramall: First day at Arsenal felt like a dream (Video)

author: Paul Morrissey
title: Cohen Bramall: First day at Arsenal felt like a dream (Video)
text:
Cohen Bramall: First day at Arsenal felt like a dream (Video) By Paul Morrissey   Arsenal sign Cohen Bramall from 7th tier Hednesford Town 
Arsene Wenger yesterday confirmed the signing of Cohen Bramall from 7th tier Hednesford Town. 
It’s quite an incredible transfer; Premier League giants Arsenal have just signed a non-league player for 40 grand; you don’t hear of these stories much any more these days. ‘Like a Dream’ 
The 20-year-old left back was invited for a trial last month, and he obviously impressed, as Arsenal decided to go ahead with the transfer. 
He appeared on Sky Sports today to talk about his sensational move, and says that his first day training with the first team felt like a dream. Loading tags...
